first_translate: did they finally break up?
uh...
it looks like they’re getting along just fine!
gunter’s mercenary troop barracks
what?! you mean something bigger than a squirrel?!

hangle: 좀 더 제대로 언질이라도 주지 그랬어?!
first_translate: would’ve been nice if he gave us more details about that!!
and then...
I heard there was quite a fight after that!

hangle: 본래 연인 사이의 일에 끼면 머리만 아플 뿐이잖아.
first_translate: but I don’t want to get involved in their business... it’ll only give me a headache.
fine by me.
that’s not why we came here anyway.
really? what for?
to put it simply...
h-hey! look at her with our captain!
she really is pretty!
is she his girlfriend or something?
gir--
you guys better watch your mouths.
or else you might end up losing your heads.
the prince
prince’s lover
yep.
captain, stop trying so hard to protect him!

hangle: 권터 말 듣는 게 좋을 거야.
first_translate: listen to gunter on this one.
for being the captain's girl, she seems pretty tough.

hangle: 얼굴은 곱게 자란 아가씨처럼 생겨서 그렇게 안 보이는―.
first_translate: she doesn’t seem like it because she has such a cute face--
I’m actually the client.
ooh... okay.
do you know how much money we cost?

hangle: 의뢰주랍시고 거들먹거리다가 즉시 발 돌린 녀석들도 꽤 된다고!
first_translate: a lot of people have tried hiring us before but ended up running away when they found out how expensive we were!

hangle: 보아하니 아직 대장이 의뢰 수락도 안 한 것 같은데―.
first_translate: from where I stand, though, it looks as if the captain hasn’t accepted your request yet.
oh my, really?
then let me correct myself.
let me try again.
I am...
...a rich and powerful client.
can’t believe someone bought off the entire troop...
nobles are all alike...
until when do we need to work for them?
my bad...
pwoof
of course,
until duke abel returns safely.
siegren,
what happened between you and gunter back then?
nothin'.
lies!!!

hangle: 그보다 용건이 끝나자마자 바로 떨어져서 여기까지 달려오다니,
first_translate: anyway, did you have to run straight over here right after finishing your errand?
that wasn’t very considerate of you.

hangle: 내 품에서 다른 남자 이름을 외치질 않나,
first_translate: not only did you call another man’s name while in my arms,
but now I feel like some abandoned mistress even though I gave everything to you.
because I love you.
kun...

hangle: 권터 때문이 아니라 아벨이 중요해서 그런 거야!
first_translate: this isn’t about gunter. it’s because finding abel is important!
I already knew that.

hangle: 거기 돈 많고 높으신 분들, 연애는 나가서 해라.
first_translate: rich folks, go date somewhere else.
my lady!

hangle: 제론, 기다렸죠. 눈보라가 치기 시작해서 마차를 두고 먼저 올라왔어요.
first_translate: jeron, thank goodness you made it. since the blizzard started coming down, I left the carriage behind and ran ahead first.
I'm glad to see you looking well.

hangle: 오래 인사할 시간이 없으니 우선 안으로 들어갈까요?
first_translate: we can catch up later. shall we head inside first?
as you wish, my lady.
welcome back to hailon.
even though I used to hate the cold,
now the familiar scent of winter tickled my nose.
abel may not be here anymore,
but it feels good to return home.
okay, then. allow me to explain the situation.
a dragon appeared.

hangle: 남은 세 마리 중 한 마리가요?
first_translate: one of the three remaining dragons?
no...
two showed up.
what...?
wait, does that mean abel went to slay those two dragons alone?

hangle: 설마 아벨이 잡으러 간 건 아니겠지.
first_translate: there’s no way he would do that.

hangle: 아무리 아벨이라도 동시에 두 마리는 절대 무리라는 것을 몰랐을 리 없는데?
first_translate: even abel knows that taking on two dragons simultaneously will be impossible.
no, he didn’t go to kill them.
more precisely speaking, he went to investigate.

hangle: 용들이 나타난 것은 헤일론을 둘러싼 산맥입니다.
first_translate: the dragons appeared around the mountains surrounding hailon.

hangle: 그 때문인지 산맥에서부터 마물의 습격도 기하급수적으로 늘었고요.
first_translate: that must be why demonic beasts began attacking from the mountains too.

hangle: 공작님께서는 물론 헤일론의 방어에 온 힘을 다하셨습니다만…
first_translate: duke abel devoted himself to defending hailon,

hangle: 이런 식으로는 끝이 없겠다고 판단하신 것 같습니다.
first_translate: but apparently, he thought things wouldn’t improve unless he took matters into his own hands.

hangle: 게다가 척후조에게 두 용이 싸우고 있다는 보고가 왔거든요.
first_translate: on top of that, scouts reported seeing the two dragons fighting each other.

hangle: 시그렌, 네가 잡은 용은 혹시 지성과 이성을 가지고 있었어?
first_translate: siegren, did the dragon you killed possess intelligence and reason?

hangle: 아니, 마물을 상대하는 것과 크게 다르지 않았어.
first_translate: nope, it was basically the same thing as dealing with any other monster.
fiona? what’s wrong?
I think I understand somewhat...
no, nevermind.
jeron, how’s the defense going?

hangle: 저와 시그렌이 공작님을 찾아 올 때까지 버틸 수 있겠어요?
first_translate: can you hold out until sieg and I find father?
it won’t be easy, but yes.

hangle: 일단 제가 데려온 용병단을 투입해 주세요.
first_translate: first, please deploy the troops I brought.

hangle: 수색대에 필요한 보급품들도 함께 준비했으니 적재적소에 사용해 주시고요.
first_translate: I also prepared supplies needed for the search party, so use them wisely.
right away, my lady!

hangle: 이미 아벨이 실종된 지 며칠이 지났다.
first_translate: several days have passed since abel disappeared.
considering food is scarce here,

hangle: 준비 없이 무작정 오지 않은 것은 잘한 일이야.
first_translate: it was wise of you to come fully prepared.
thank god.

hangle: 하지만 이제 조사단이 가져간 식량의 남은 양도 얼마 되지 않겠지.
first_translate: but I suppose the investigation team probably doesn’t have enough rations either.
of course, this is merely speculation--
